translation.app_keyword: Job, candidate, Recruiter, Maritime industry jobs, Career, Seafarer
translation.landing_hero_title: Most Integrated Maritime Professional Job Platform
translation.landing_hero_subtitle: Explore countless opportunities to connect with a vast network of professionals and find your dream job in the maritime industry through our robust community platform!
translation.landing_about_subtitle: Profesea is Seafarer and Vessel match platform that provides featured and rapid candidate sourcing for Maritime Industry. Companies and employees have a chance to choose specific-technical options and detailed criterias via Profesea. Main goal is to help personnel & HR managers find suitable seafarers for their companies quickly and easily.
translation.b_to_seafarer_detail: Discover crewing opportunities in our platform.
translation.b_to_professional_detail: Explore thousands of unlimited job opportunities in maritime industry.
translation.b_to_recruiter_detail: Find high-quality candidates on our platform.
translation.b_to_trainer_detail: Join our platform to reach a wider audience.
translation.landing_jobs_subtitle: Find any jobs in the maritime industry that match your skills and interest
translation.landing_candidate_subtitle: Find the right candidate using our specific filters made for maritime industry jobs
translation.landing_discover_subtitle: Profesea is a professional and community platform to connects people with thousands of career opportunities in the maritime industry under our network. With the principle of understanding the maritime tight community, our objective is to provide solution for human resources problems in the maritime industry using our platform
translation.landing_discover_item_title_detail: Profesea solutions can support your business and career in the Maritime World
translation.landing_footer_title: Profesea that connects your career in the maritime industry with a wide community network
translation.landing_recruiter_title_1: As a source of most qualified talents for the maritime industry
translation.landing_recruiter_title_2: Recruitment platform with filter system as needed
translation.landing_trainer_subtitle_1: we make it easier for you to reach more audiences, and generate your business better
translation.landing_trainer_subtitle_2: with a professional maritime database that Profesea has, we can provide an effective alternative marketing channel and boost up your business
translation.landing_lets_sail: Let's Sail Toward Your Dream Job
translation.landing_features_title_5: Social Media and Community Discussion Forum
translation.landing_features_subtitle_1: Fresh candidates with connections may find companies that suit their qualifications.
translation.landing_features_subtitle_2: Create, update, and upload your CV and Certificate realtime.
translation.landing_features_subtitle_3: Reminder for due date and next scheduled certification directly to your email.
translation.landing_features_subtitle_4: Display your availability status and get spotlight from the recruiters right away.
translation.landing_features_subtitle_5: Exchange ideas and expand your network with various professionals in the maritime industry.
